mapper.select: select m.member_id, member_file_system_name, a.apply_id, apply_location, apply_date, apply_register_date, starter_member_id, veteran_member_id, apply_status, review_id, r.member_id, review_register_date, review_update_date, review_title, review_content, review_file_system_name, review_grade, r.apply_id FROM tbl_member m join tbl_review r on m.member_id = r.member_id join tbl_apply a on r.apply_id = a.apply_id where m.member_id = #{memberId} order by apply_register_date desc
